title: 4/28/17 - Danielle DiMartino Booth Explains Why The Federal Reserve is bad for America
description:
Danielle DiMartino Booth, author of FED UP joins Glenn to discuss why the Federal Reserve System is bad for America ...The biggest theft in all of human history? ...The ability to wipe your memories? ...Updating the "Court Case of The Century" ...Tim Ballard and Matt Osbourne from OURRescue.org discuss their latest rescue o children from the sex slave trade ...Bill Nye is so not a 'science' guy.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
